review: It has been great!  My kids love the programming available on the Prime movies and shows.  I have not fully explored the options available but hope to be able to explore more from the internet than I have so far.

review: The Fire Stick is great!  I also have Chromecast, but I like that I don't need to use any device to use the fire stick.  Once it's on you just use the remote to navigate and that's all there is to it!
